name: Lawrence Culley - Succushooter (Challenge 2)
description:
Description

Succushooter is a game about sending your miniature black hole space ship into space to intercept enemy lasers before they can hit the mothership. Your black hole ship can absorb lasers when they get close enough, which the black hole ship can then use to damage enemies with. The enemies will be aiming towards the mothership, if the enemies shoot the mothership 10 times, the game is over.

Key Features

A twist on the classic arcade space shoot-em-up genre

Increasing difficulty based on skill

Simple and easy controls

The Controls

The black hole ship is controlled using the mouse cursor to move. The player can press escape at any time to quit.
